Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class mt::RequestQueue< T >

Locked, dual condition request queue.

This is a generic class for locked buffers. Stick anything in T and it will be protected by a queue lock and two condition variables. When you call dequeue, this class blocks until there is data (there is a critical section).

This class is the basis for the two provided thread pool APIs, AbstractThreadPool<Request_T> and BasicThreadPool<RequestHandler_T>
